statements: UPDATE WasteRecyclingProcesses SET recycle_percentage = 70 WHERE process_id = 1;
UPDATE WasteRecyclingProcesses SET material_used = 'Plastic Bottles' WHERE process_name = 'Plastic Recycling';
UPDATE WasteRecyclingProcesses SET recycle_percentage = 85.5, material_used = 'Plastic' WHERE process_id = 1;
UPDATE WasteRecyclingProcesses SET material_used = 'Glass', recycle_percentage = 70.2 WHERE process_id = 2;
UPDATE WasteManagementProcesses SET location='New Location' WHERE process_id=1;
UPDATE RecyclingMaterials SET category='Plastic' WHERE material_id=2;
UPDATE WasteManagementProcesses SET process_name = 'Waste Sorting', location = 'City Center', start_date = '2022-01-15', end_date = '2022-02-28' WHERE process_id = 1;
UPDATE RecyclingMaterials SET category = 'Plastic', recycling_fee = 12.50, material_name = 'Bottles' WHERE material_id = 3;
UPDATE WasteRecyclingProcesses SET process_description = 'New process description' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE WasteMaterials SET recycling_percentage = 75 WHERE material_id = 3;
UPDATE WasteRecyclingProcesses SET process_description = 'New process description', start_date = '2022-05-01' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE WasteMaterials SET recycling_percentage = 75.5, material_name = 'Updated Material Name' WHERE material_id = 3;
UPDATE waste_recycling_process SET process_status = 'Completed' WHERE process_id = 1;
UPDATE materials_used SET material_quantity = 500 WHERE material_id = 3;
UPDATE waste_recycling_process SET process_type = 'Advanced' WHERE process_id = 1;
UPDATE materials_used SET material_quantity = 500, material_type = 'Plastic' WHERE material_id = 3;
UPDATE RecyclingCenter SET location='123 Main Street' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE Materials SET recyclable=true, material_type='Plastic' WHERE id=2;
UPDATE Materials SET recyclable = false WHERE material_type = 'Plastic';
UPDATE WasteDisposal SET disposal_location = 'Landfill' WHERE disposal_date >= '2022-01-01';
